title: Dove White Moisturizing Beauty Bar Soap - 2pk - 3.75oz each

title: Dove Gentle Exfoliating Beauty Bar Soap - 4pk - 3.75oz each

title: Beauty by Earth Shaving Soap Bar
description: PERFECT FOR ALL OVER: Whether youre shaving your head, your toes, or anywhere in between, our simple shaving soap bar will treat your skin right.
SHOW YOUR SKIN SOME LOVE: With our rich lathering, cleansing, and moisturizing shave bar that goes on smooth, cleanses, it will make you look and feel absolutely incredible.

NATURAL AND ORGANIC INGREDIENT:  Infused with the special goodness of Lemongrass Oil, Lavender Oil, Cedarwood Oil, and Unrefined Shea Butter, you never have to worry about harsh chemicals that irritate or over dry, or damage your skin. Our soap is sulfate free, and paraben free.
BYE BYE BUMPS AND BURNS:  Because shaving shouldnt have to involve torture that leaves your skin red, irritated, and bumpy.

MADE IN THE USA:  Like everything we make, our organic soap is cruelty free and made in the USA. Its handmade in small batches - weve left out all the junk and made sure to include only the highest quality natural and organic ingredients.

DESIGNED FOR MEN: Men’s skin care is different. Men sweat more, have thicker skin and lose hydration faster. Dove Men+Care is specifically developed for men’s skin to protect it against skin dryness.
